title: Spectator Out Loud: Kate Andrews, Mary Wakefield and Caroline Crampton
description: On this week's episode, Kate Andrews argues that the government's social care reform plans simply don't add up (00:55). Mary Wakefield makes the case for church doors to reopen (06:55) and Caroline Crampton reviews Tom Chivers's new book, London Clay (13:25).
itunes:author: The Spectator
dc:creator: The Spectator
